actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to provide for treatment of the Commonwealth of Puerto Rico as a State with a single health service area for purposes of title XV of the Public Health Service Act.

summary.text: Treats the commonwealth of Puerto Rico as a State with a single health service area for purposes of Title XV (National Health Planning and Development) of the Public Health Service Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide for treatment of the Commonwealth of Puerto Rico as a State with a single health service area for purposes of title XV of the Public Health Service Act.
